alert.note: Alert for Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:10PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cochise County through 600 PM MST... At 510 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tombstone, or 13 miles northeast of Sierra Vista. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sierra Vista, Whetstone, Huachuca City, Tombstone, Fairbank and Charleston. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 310 and 312, and between mile markers 315 and 327. Route 82 between mile markers 53 and 67. Route 90 between mile markers 309 and 312, and between mile markers 324 and 332. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
